# docker_login (Data Source)

Reads the current login information.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "docker_hub_login" "current" {}

output "current_user" {
	value = data.docker_hub_login.current.username
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `username` (String) Current username
